column6: "CRAZY LIKE A FOX" pt. 3 (of 4) THE DEBUT OF THE NEW ... CAPTAIN MARVEL?! There's a new sheriff in town, and man is she pissed! Marv goes home to Titan and finds a ghost town ... and a new Captain Marvel ready to take his mantle, whether he wants to give it up or not.   The series changes right here! 32 PGS./MARVEL PSR...$2.99
column8: | penciller:Paul Azaceta | writer:Peter David | penciller (cover):Scott Kolins
